title: Hey Riot when its Championship Riven and Zed coming out?????????

replies.body: There hasn't been an official announcement yet, but more than likely it will be sometime during worlds, just like all Championship skins have in the past.

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiemaster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ubHn7RTh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-26T18:23:21.630+0000)
>
> There hasn't been an official announcement yet, but more than likely it will be sometime during worlds, just like all Championship skins have in the past.

Do you know in what time between are the finals ?

Is it in October or November ?

Please help out

I have to get my Wallet ready :)
I'm sorry but I don't know. :/

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiemaster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ubHn7RTh,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-08-26T18:46:27.569+0000)
>
> I'm sorry but I don't know. :/

oooh okay

We don't have any information on new or upcoming content until it's actually released.  Bookmark our [Sales ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales)site to stay updated on that.  Good luck!

So when will you guys be revealing Victorious GP?

_Am I doing this Champion-main thing right?_

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ubHn7RTh,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-26T20:52:35.415+0000)
>
> We don't have any information on new or upcoming content until it's actually released.  Bookmark our [Sales ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales)site to stay updated on that.  Good luck!

Riot you need to tell us when you put skins like that up soo we can prepare our wallets dont just leave us in the dark and expect the last minute to be able to come up with the money
They will be around same time as worlds, expect them there for a couple weeks to a month.

>
> We don't have any information on new or upcoming content until it's actually released.  Bookmark our [Sales ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales)site to stay updated on that.  Good luck!
